short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to send trackable emails from Gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome plug-in allows users to select and send Mindmatrix (AMP) email templates via their Gmail account,  track prospect activity, create opportunity, View and download personalized  assets,  and do social postings Users can then track the key metrics of such email campaigns such as open rates, link clicks etc. via the Mindmatrix (AMP) platform.
